DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this phase I portion are; 1) to evaluate the safety and tolerability of MK2461 and 2) to determine the recommended phase 2 dose or doses of MK2461. The purpose of the phase II portion is to evaluate the anti-tumor efficacy of MK2461.
DOC.brief_title: MK2461 Phase I/II Study in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors (MK-2461-002 AM1)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients must be at least 18 years of age, with adequate organ function, and an ecog performance of <2 No chemotherapy, radiotherapy, or biological therapy with 4 weeks of study participation Patients must not have primary central nervous system tumor
